body.intro: I developed a mobile-responsive frontend website that showcases both static and dynamic pages. This platform provides valuable resources on corporate governance, including:
features: Overview of the organization and its mission.
Programs and Courses: Educational offerings for directors.
Membership Information: Benefits and application details.
Contact Information: Support and inquiry details.
About Us: History and organizational structure.
Advocacy: Policy initiatives in governance.
News and Updates: Articles and announcements.
Event Listings and updates
A Blog featuring insights from industry experts
body.finale: This project emphasizes user engagement through a clean, intuitive design and allows easy access to essential information and services.

body.intro: I developed and maintained a mobile-responsive website that showcases both static and dynamic pages. The platform enables users to check digital banking services, including:
features: Loan Applications for car and personal financing.
Account application.
Card replacement services for accounts.
Branch Locator for cash-in and cash-out services through an interactive map interface.
Contact for concerns by submitting and viewing support tickets.
FAQs Frequently Asked Questions.
Services offered.
body.finale: This project focuses on user experience by offering top-notch services and facilitating smooth processing of applications and transactions.

body.intro: I developed web application pages for digital medical forms, designed to simplify the process of collecting and managing patient information.
I contributed to the development of the project tracking system that streamlines project management and enhances team collaboration. Key features include:
features: Project Information: Provide detailed insights into project objectives, timelines, team members, and resource allocation for better visibility and planning.
Task Management: Create, assign, and track tasks with deadlines and priorities.
Real-Time: Record task progress and monitor overall project advancement.
Reporting: Generate comprehensive reports on project status.
How to: A Guide for Using the Web-Based Application.
User Management: Manage user roles and permissions, allowing for secure access control and tailored user experiences.
body.finale: The web-based application enhances productivity and ensures that projects are monitored and completed on time and within scope.

body.intro: I developed and maintained frontend and backend website designed to provide users with up-to-date news and insights based on geographic locations. Key features include
features: Location-Based News: Deliver news articles and updates relevant to specific regions or locations based on the client's security decision needs.
Interactive Map: Users can visually explore news articles through an interactive map interface.
Search Functionality: Enable users to search for news articles using keywords, locations, or categories.
body.finale: This project aims to enhance user engagement and security by delivering relevant news tailored to individual or group preferences.

title: Content Management System for Location News Intelligence Website
subTitle: Business Profiles Inc

body.intro: I developed and maintained a Content Management System (CMS) specifically for Location News Intelligence, designed to effectively manage and distribute news content according to geographic relevance. Key features include:
features: User Management: Set up and manage user roles and permissions, ensuring secure access tailored to the needs of different users or researchers.
News Article Management: Create, edit, publish and delete news articles relevant to specific locations with ease.
Location-Based News: Organize and display news by pinning it on a map based on geographic regions, allowing users to stay informed about local incidents.
body.finale: This CMS improves the management of news content submitted by the researchers.
